power.title: Angelic Witnesses
power.fluff: Your prayers bring the attention of ghostly minor angels, who stand and silently observe you in battle

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a silent, ghostly angel in 1 square in the burst. The angel lasts until the end of your next turn and occupies its square. For each time you have used healing word since the start of your previous turn, you conjure an additional angel in a square that is not adjacent to another ghostly angel.
When an ally adjacent to the angel spends a healing surge, he or she regains 4 hit points in addition to any other effects of spending the surge.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The angels persists, and you can move any or all angels up to 4 squares.

power.title: Armor of Faith
power.fluff: You clothe your ally in shining golden armor created from the essence of the Astral Sea

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +4 power bonus to a defense of your choice until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Blackened Soul
power.fluff: A pulse of shadow leaves your hands to seek your ally, granting vigor and strength but leaving a dark stain on that companion's soul

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One dying ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend up to two healing surges to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value for each surge spent.
Until the target is restored to full hit points or until the end of the encounter, whichever comes first, the target is touched by death.
While touched by death, the target grants combat advantage but gains a +2 power bonus to both attack rolls and damage rolls.

power.title: Bless
power.fluff: You beseech your deity to bless you and your allies

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Cure Light Wounds
power.fluff: You utter a simple prayer, and your touch momentarily suffuses you or a wounded creature with a dim silver light that heals minor injuries

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

section.name: Healer's Lore:
section.text: The additional hit points regained when spending a healing surge apply also apply to the healing granted by this power.

power.title: Divine Aid
power.fluff: You request your deity to grant you or one of your allies the strength to overcome a hindrance

section.name: Target:
section.text: You or one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes a saving throw against an effect that a save can end, with a bonus to the save equal to your Strength modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Divine Skill
power.fluff: You grant divine grace to bolster your ally's prowess in a skill at a crucial moment

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a power bonus to his or her next skill check before the end of the encounter. The bonus depends on the skill for the check:
► On a Heal check or Religion check, the bonus equals your your Strength modifier or your Charisma modifier, whichever is higher.
► On an Acrobatics check, Athletics check, Endurance check, Intimidate check, Stealth check, or Thievery check, the bonus equals your Strength modifier.
► On an Arcana check, Bluff check, Diplomacy check, Dungeoneering check, History check, Insight check, Nature check, Perception check, or Streetwise check, the bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Holy Vestments
power.fluff: Glowing sigils blossom over your armor, forming a protective web

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 5 to the chosen damage type, and any ally who ends a move adjacent to you gains resist 5 to the chosen damage type until the start of his or her next turn.

power.title: Life Transference
power.fluff: Bruises and lacerations appear on your body as they vanish from your patient

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature other than you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take damage equal to your healing surge value, which can't be reduced or prevented in any way, and the target regains hit points equal to twice that value.

power.title: Resurgent Strength
power.fluff: This healing prayer staunches wounds while also providing your ally with energy to redouble an attack

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: You or one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
The target also gains a +4 power bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Return from Death's Door
power.fluff: You snatch an ally from the brink of death

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 20 squares of you fails a death saving throw

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target succeeds on the triggering death saving throw, and can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Sanctuary
power.fluff: You cast a protective ward upon a creature, making enemies' attacks less effective

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains a +5 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. The bonus immediately ends if the target makes an attack.

power.title: Shielding Sacrifice
power.fluff: The power of your faith siphons life out of you and bolsters your ally with divine protection

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take damage equal to your healing surge value, which can't be reduced or prevented in any way, and the target gains temporary hit points equal to twice that value.

power.title: Shield of Faith
power.fluff: A gleaming shield of divine energy appears over you, granting you and nearby allies protection against attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Veil of Darkness
power.fluff: You create a barrier of pure darkness that no light can enter

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of darkness until the end of your next turn.
The zone is heavily obscured and blocks line of sight.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.
